meanings.definition: Relating to or resembling a cynosure.
meanings.sent1: The cynosural dress she wore sparkled under the lights.
meanings.sent2: The shiny trophy was the cynosural object on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The cynosural cat caught everyone's eye with its fluffy tail.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a cynosural beacon in the room.
meanings.sent5: The colorful painting was the cynosural masterpiece of the exhibit.

meanings.definition: Serving as a focal point of attention or admiration.
meanings.sent1: The bright fireworks were the cynosural display in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The famous singer was the cynosural figure at the concert.
meanings.sent3: The delicious cake was the cynosural star of the party.
meanings.sent4: His charisma made him the cynosural leader of the group.
meanings.sent5: The stunning sunset was the cynosural moment of the day.
